argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isms.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` K ) |
| 2 |  | isms.x | |- X = ( Base ` K ) |
| 3 |  | isms.d | |- D = ( ( dist ` K ) |` ( X X. X ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_isxms | |- ( K e. *MetSp <-> ( K e. TopSp /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 1 | #P_istps | |- ( K e. TopSp <-> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_df-mopn | |- MetOpen = ( x e. U. ran *Met |-> ( topGen ` ran ( ball ` x ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_dmmptss | |- dom MetOpen C_ U. ran *Met |
| 8 |  | #P_toponmax | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> X e. J ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) /\ J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> X e. J ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) /\ J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) /\ J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> X e. ( MetOpen ` D ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_elfvdm | |- ( X e. ( MetOpen ` D ) -> D e. dom MetOpen ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) /\ J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> D e. dom MetOpen ) |
| 14 | 7, 13 | #P_sseldi | |- ( ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) /\ J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> D e. U. ran *Met ) |
| 15 |  | #P_xmetunirn | |- ( D e. U. ran *Met <-> D e. ( *Met ` dom dom D ) ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_sylib | |- ( ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) /\ J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> D e. ( *Met ` dom dom D ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( MetOpen ` D ) = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_mopntopon | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` dom dom D ) -> ( MetOpen ` D ) e. ( TopOn ` dom dom D ) ) |
| 19 | 16, 18 | #P_syl | |- ( ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) /\ J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> ( MetOpen ` D ) e. ( TopOn ` dom dom D ) ) |
| 20 | 10, 19 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) /\ J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> J e. ( TopOn ` dom dom D ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_toponuni | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` dom dom D ) -> dom dom D = U. J ) |
| 22 | 20, 21 | #P_syl | |- ( ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) /\ J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> dom dom D = U. J ) |
| 23 |  | #P_toponuni | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> X = U. J ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) /\ J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> X = U. J ) |
| 25 | 22, 24 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) /\ J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> dom dom D = X ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) /\ J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> ( *Met ` dom dom D ) = ( *Met ` X ) ) |
| 27 | 16, 26 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) /\ J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) |
| 28 | 27 | #P_ex | |- ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) -> ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) ) |
| 29 | 17 | #P_mopntopon | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( MetOpen ` D ) e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 30 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) -> ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) <-> ( MetOpen ` D ) e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) ) |
| 31 | 29, 30 | #P_syl5ibr | |- ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) -> ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) ) |
| 32 | 28, 31 | #P_impbid | |- ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) -> ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) <-> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) ) |
| 33 | 5, 32 | #P_syl5bb | |- ( J = ( MetOpen ` D ) -> ( K e. TopSp <-> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) ) |
| 34 | 33 | #P_pm5.32ri | |- ( ( K e. TopSp /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) <-> ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) ) |
| 35 | 4, 34 | #P_bitri | |- ( K e. *MetSp <-> ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) ) |
